sentences.sContent: Jesus specialized in menial tasks that everyone else tried to avoid: washing feet, helping children, fixing breakfast, and serving lepers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jesus specialized in menial tasks that everyone else tried to avoid: washing feet, helping children, fixing breakfast, and serving lepers.
sentences.sCn: 耶稣专做一些每个人都想避免的卑微工作：洗脚、帮助小孩、预备早餐及服事麻疯病人。

synos.tran: 卑微的；仆人的；适合仆人做的
仆人；住家佣工；下贱的人
